original_text: And he that is the high priest among his brethren, upon whose head the anointing oil was poured, and that is consecrated to put on the garments, shall not uncover his head, nor rend his clothes;
korean_text: 자기의 형제 중 관유로 부음을 받고 위임되어 그 예복을 입은 대제사장은 그의 머리를 풀지 말며 그의 옷을 찢지 말며

sentences.original_text: And he that is the high priest among his brethren
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그의 형제 중 대제사장이며

sentences.original_text: upon whose head the anointing oil was poured
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 머리에 기름 부음을 받은 자

sentences.original_text: and that is consecrated to put on the garments
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 제사장 옷을 입도록 구별된 자
